answers.answer: possible peripheral neropathy- should have a neurological test done
Also, has he been checked for diabetes? Typical symptoms of diabetic neuropathy.

question: My father has burning sensation in the calf of his legs from his knees to his ankles.  What could be causing this?  He says it's like someone has hot hot towels on his legs.  He has had tests done and nothing has showing up.Thanks
title: Burning sensation from knees to ankles
